text:
I have installed the Apache server 2.0.52 on Win2k Advanced server with all 
updates. (surly without installing the MS server)
All works wonderful and fast (Perl,PHP,Sessions) but whenever I load the 
mod_logio.so into the server by adding this line into the .conf file like this:

LoadModule log_io_module modules/mod_logio.so

and reboot. The server prompts a system error system saying that Apache server 
service can't start.
If you ask if the file mod_logio.so exists? Yes it does.
Apache simply crashed and doesn't start.
I have removed the mod_logio.so from the .conf file and everything runs 
perfectly.
creator: sambukkaa@hotmail.com
nd@perlig.de
text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 33010 ***
